languages.text: Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain momentum equal to their resolve.

Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用与前一次攻击类型不同的攻击时，都会额外获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用与前一次攻击类型不同的攻击时，都会额外获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}，等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。

languages.text: Совершая атаку, которая по типу отличается от предыдущей, персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g}, равный своей {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Совершая атаку, которая по типу отличается от предыдущей, персонаж получает моментум, равный своей решимости.
Совершая атаку, которая по типу отличается от предыдущей, персонаж получает моментум, равный своей решимости.

languages.text: 使用者が直前の攻撃と異なるタイプの攻撃を使用するたびに、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を獲得する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が直前の攻撃と異なるタイプの攻撃を使用するたびに、使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を獲得する。

languages.text: Si el portador usa un ataque de un tipo diferente al anterior, obtiene {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} equivalente a su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador usa un ataque de un tipo diferente al anterior, obtiene {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} equivalente a su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.

languages.text: Immer wenn der Träger einen Angriff nutzt, der einem anderen Typ als der vorige angehört, erhält er {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} entsprechend seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger einen Angriff nutzt, der einem anderen Typ als der vorige angehört, erhält er {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} entsprechend seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une attaque d'un type différent de la précédente, il reçoit un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} égal à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une attaque d'un type différent de la précédente, il reçoit un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} égal à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une attaque d'un type différent de la précédente, il reçoit un nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} égal à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.
